text: As mentioned, this issue was reserved for the R Dev Day that took place yesterday. Although the issue seemed simple (updating an error message), the important part of the task was carefully checking which cases triggered each error message, to be sure that the new error message was triggered only when necessary. A team went through this and came up with a revised patch for both the code and the documentation based on their tests.
